The '''Aranara Series''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a 4-star [[Weapon Series]].

All weapons in this series can be [[Forging|forged]]. Forging these weapons notably require {{Item|Midlander Billet Trove|link=Midlander Billet|text=Midlander Billets|30}} and {{Item|Crystal Chunk|text=Crystal Chunks|30}}, among other materials. The diagrams for all weapons in this series are sold by [[Aravinay]] at [[Mahavanaranapna]].

Only [[Forest Regalia]] and [[Sapwood Blade]] share the same passive.
